title: Help! The LoL Alpha Client kicked me out and i cant login anymore.
body: The LoL Alpha Client kicked me out and i cant login anymore.

replies.body: I'm afraid you might have to provide more information than that for them to be able to assist...

> [{quoted}](name=Erractic Eick,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ub3zXk1w,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-07T04:18:28.022+0000)
>
> I'm afraid you might have to provide more information than that for them to be able to assist...

I couldnt tell anything else.

If you were kicked offline, and now the client won't let you sign in with the correct password, there's a chance that your account may have become compromised. If that's the case, your best bet would be to reach out to us through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) in order to get your account back in your hands.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Ub3zXk1w,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-07T04:26:57.180+0000)
>
> If you were kicked offline, and now the client won't let you sign in with the correct password, there's a chance that your account may have become compromised. If that's the case, your best bet would be to reach out to us through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) in order to get your account back in your hands.

It didnt not get compromised, the client just couldnt let me in.
It let me in after i stopped the XBox Game DVR.
